H0.text: The Pacific Plate is the tectonic plate that most of the United States is a part of.

H1.text: Eurasian Plate is the tectonic plate that most of the United States is a part of.

H2.text: North American Plate is the tectonic plate that most of the United States is part of.

H3.text: The South American Plate is the tectonic plate that covers most of the United States.

A4.text: New Madrid seismic zone is an ancient intraplate fault within the North American plate
